Module com.augursolutions.wordler
Package com.augursolutions.wordler

Class Word

java.lang.Object
com.augursolutions.wordler.Word
public class Word extends Object
Class for storing details about a word - definitions, parts of speech, and spelling
Author:
Steven Major

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Word()
    Empty constructor, this is not the same as new Word(null, null, null) - this leaves partsOfSpeech as an empty list
    Word(String letters)
    Initialize a Word object with no definitions or parts of speech
    Word(String letters, String definition)
    Initialize a Word object with spelling and definition, but no parts of speech
    Word(String letters, List<String> definitions, List<Word.Part_Of_Speech> partsOfSpeech)
    General constructor for Word object

  • Constructor Details

    • Word

      public Word()
      Empty constructor, this is not the same as new Word(null, null, null) - this leaves partsOfSpeech as an empty list

    • Word

      public Word(String letters)
      Initialize a Word object with no definitions or parts of speech
      Parameters:
      letters - value to assign to the letters field

    • Word

      public Word(String letters, String definition)
      Initialize a Word object with spelling and definition, but no parts of speech
      Parameters:
      letters - value to assign to the letters field
      definition - value to add to the definition list

    • Word

      public Word(String letters, List<String> definitions, List<Word.Part_Of_Speech> partsOfSpeech)
      General constructor for Word object
      Parameters:
      letters - Spelling of the word
      definitions - List of definitions - more than one for homographs (words with the same spelling but different meanings)
      partsOfSpeech - parts of speech for each definition

  • Method Details

    • getLetters

      public String getLetters()
      Get letters of the word as a String
      Returns:
      letters field (can be null)

    • setLetters

      public void setLetters(String letters)
      Set the letters field
      Parameters:
      letters - Letters that make up the word, i.e. its spelling

    • getDefinitions

      public List<String> getDefinitions()
      Get the definition of the word
      Returns:
      the definition field (can be null)

    • setDefinitions

      public void setDefinitions(List<String> definitions)
      Set the definition of the word
      Parameters:
      definitions - A string that defines the word

    • hasDefintiions

      public boolean hasDefintiions()
      Check that a word has a definition
      Returns:
      true if the definition field is not null and not empty

    • getPartsOfSpeech

      public List<Word.Part_Of_Speech> getPartsOfSpeech()
      List of parts of speech associated with the word - one per definition
      Returns:
      List of Word.Part_Of_Speech values for this word

    • setPartsOfSpeech

      public void setPartsOfSpeech(List<Word.Part_Of_Speech> partsOfSpeech)
      Assign a list of Word.Part_Of_Speech values to a word.
      Parameters:
      partsOfSpeech - List of Word.Part_Of_Speech values to associate with the word

    • toChars

      public char[] toChars()
      Returns the letters field as a char array
      Returns:
      The letters field as a char array

    • length

      public int length()
      Returns the length of the letters field - identical to getLetters().length() when letters is not null
      Returns:
      The length of the letters field

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the letters field, or "" if thatfield is null
